wikipedia_page.main: David Clarke (born 6 June 1950) is a Scottish former football player and manager. Clarke played for East Fife for his whole career, making over 500 league appearances. He holds the club record for most appearances, with 627 in all competitions. Clarke has also managed East Fife, in two different spells, and Falkirk.

response: |Dave Clarke - Managerial Period & Record, bettermeddle.org.uk. Retrieved 28 June 2012.
David or Dave Clarke may refer to:
* Dave Clarke (musician) (born 1948), American singer, guitarist, and keyboard player
* Dave Clarke (English footballer) (born 1949), English football goalkeeper
* Dave Clarke (Scottish footballer) (born 1950), Scottish football player and manager
* Dave Clarke (Canadian football) (born 1950), Canadian football player
* Dave Clarke (rugby league), rugby league footballer for Wales in 2004
